Location:
- Kitchen â€“ countertop electric range.

Observations:
- Glass-ceramic cooktop with four radiant burners; surface appears clean with minor staining around burners.
- White control panel with dial controls and digital clock.
- Blue/gray speckled laminate countertop; light gray wall above.
- Standard duplex outlet mounted to the wall left of the range.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No action required; routine cleaning of cooktop. If remodeling occurs, verify nearby outlets have proper GFCI protection and code compliance.
